titles.title: SCALE Act
SCALE Act
Storing CO2 And Lowering Emissions Act
To require the Secretary of Energy to establish programs for carbon dioxide capture, transport, utilization, and storage, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Storing CO2 And Lowering Emissions Act or the SCALE Act
This bill establishes programs that provide incentives to develop infrastructure for carbon dioxide capture, transport, utilization, and storage.
